title: Scars of Silver
description: Scars of Silver(Rise of the Unseelie # 2)You’d think the fey would have each others' backs. That’s what you’d think… if you never met any.Malcolm is Sidhe, the only race that possesses the coveted magic of the Touch. He’s also an untrained teenage runaway who only just discovered that he’s fey. He thought the fey would have each others' backs. That’s what he honestly thought…Until he met a Changeling.
author: S.A. Archer
